name: The Chase Racing: Realistic 3D lorry and Car driver racing game
name_original: The Chase Racing: Realistic 3D lorry and Car driver racing game
description:
The Chase Racing brings the true spirit, freedom and sense of adventure of the on-road experience to your mobile device.

Set out to challenge a variety of racing types and obstacles that will push both vehicles and drivers to their limits.
The Chase Racing is a MUST-HAVE for any Race enthusiasts! Join the revolution and start Racing TODAY!

The Chase Racing is a heart-pounding, visually astounding 3D racer that puts the control directly in your hands.

The Chase Racing combines stunning, high-fidelity graphics with addictive gameplay and In The Chase Racing, being daring and passing Avoid traffic, to help you through your chase and your score.

And when you’re ready, it’s time to challenge the players that rule the game.
